Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory199.png'}
{3: 'Luna is sitting on a bench in the plaza. In the center of the plaza is a huge shark statue.'}
{3: 'Under the shark statue is an eastern-looking family crest with a name inscribed in gold—Shark-speare.'}
{3: 'Luna is absentmindedly glancing at a poster next to the bench. It shows a comical image of Shark-speare holding its arms over its head and running away.'}
{3: 'This shark mascot can be seen everywhere in the water park, from building decorations to souvenirs.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: '...What a loving grandfather you have.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Luna looks up at the statue of Shark-speare. It is playing children's songs on a loop."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shark-speare', 3: "Let's play!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shark-speare', 3: 'Shark-speare loves gingerbread men!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "With Shark-speare's singing flowing past her ears, Luna arrives before the statue. She touches it gently with one hand, and a sanguine bolt flashes across the statue."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Incoming connection request—'}
{3: "The electronic voice is coming from Luna's bracelet, with the dialer's name displayed in the center of the screen. Luna taps the bracelet lightly and connects."}
{2: 'Vigorous Male Voice', 3: 'The wrap-up work in Kowloong is complete.'}
{2: 'Vigorous Male Voice', 3: 'According to the reports from my informants, Babylonia will soon start collaborating with the ARU on something new.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Let them be. Our mission is more important right now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vigorous Male Voice', 3: 'Very well. I hope what you gain from this is worth all the trouble.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'That will be none of your concern.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vigorous Male Voice', 3: '...Indeed. Allow me to apologize for overstepping.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I know your ways. Do keep in mind "who" you use them on.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vigorous Male Voice', 3: 'Naturally. All for the Ascension-Network.'}
{3: 'Luna disconnects.'}
{3: 'The energy center beneath her feet roars, and along with the storm of virus swirling madly in the air, Luna knows—the show is about to begin.'}
